narration.utterances: Hapo kale paliishi msichana kwa jina Kalabushe

text.sentence: Hapo kale, paliishi msichana kwa jina Kalabushe.

narration.utterances: Kalabushe alikuwa chiriku

text.sentence: Kalabushe alikuwa chiriku.

narration.utterances: Alionywa na mamake kutozungumza sana lakini hakusikia

text.sentence: Alionywa na mamake kutozungumza sana, lakini hakusikia.

narration.utterances: Siku moja shangaziye Kalabushe aliyeishi ng'ambo ile ya kijiji cha Kalabushe aliugua

text.sentence: Siku moja, shangaziye Kalabushe, aliyeishi ng'ambo ile ya kijiji cha Kalabushe, aliugua.

narration.utterances: Mamake Kalabushe alikuwa na shughuli nyingi siku hiyo

text.sentence: Mamake Kalabushe alikuwa na shughuli nyingi siku hiyo.

narration.utterances: Kalabushe alipopewa chakula kumpelekea shangaziye tayari ilikuwa jioni

text.sentence: Kalabushe alipopewa chakula kumpelekea shangaziye, tayari ilikuwa jioni.

narration.utterances: Njiani Kalabushe alikutana na fisi kwa jina Sinsou

text.sentence: Njiani, Kalabushe alikutana na fisi kwa jina Sinsou.

narration.utterances: Sinsou alikuwa amegeuka kuwa mtu

text.sentence: Sinsou alikuwa amegeuka kuwa mtu.

narration.utterances: Sinsou alimwuliza alichobeba

text.sentence: Sinsou alimwuliza alichobeba.

narration.utterances: Kalabushe alijibu Nimebeba nyama mayai na maziwa

text.sentence: Kalabushe alijibu, "Nimebeba nyama, mayai na maziwa."

narration.utterances: Kalabushe alikuwa ameonywa kutosema alichobeba

text.sentence: Kalabushe alikuwa ameonywa kutosema alichobeba.

narration.utterances: Kalabushe vile vile alimwambia Sinsou kuwa shangaziye alikuwa mgonjwa na kwamba alikuwa anampelekea chakula

text.sentence: Kalabushe vile vile alimwambia Sinsou kuwa shangaziye alikuwa mgonjwa na kwamba alikuwa anampelekea chakula.

narration.utterances: Sinsou alidondokwa mate alipofikiria juu ya nyama aliyobeba Kalabushe

text.sentence: Sinsou alidondokwa mate alipofikiria juu ya nyama aliyobeba Kalabushe.

narration.utterances: Haraka haraka Sinsou alikimbia mbele

text.sentence: Haraka haraka, Sinsou alikimbia mbele.

narration.utterances: Alienda katika nyumba ya shangaziye Kalabushe na kusubiri

text.sentence: Alienda katika nyumba ya shangaziye Kalabushe na kusubiri.

narration.utterances: Alimmeza shangaziye Kalabushe kisha akajigubika blanketi lake

text.sentence: Alimmeza shangaziye Kalabushe kisha akajigubika blanketi lake.

narration.utterances: Kalabushe alipowasili nyumba ilikuwa kimya kabisa

text.sentence: Kalabushe alipowasili, nyumba ilikuwa kimya kabisa.

narration.utterances: Aliingia ndani na kuita Shangazi uko wapi

text.sentence: Aliingia ndani na kuita, "Shangazi, uko wapi?"

narration.utterances: Kalabushe hakusikia sauti ya shangaziye

text.sentence: Kalabushe hakusikia sauti ya shangaziye.

narration.utterances: Aliingia ndani ya chumba ambamo kawaida shangaziye alilala

text.sentence: Aliingia ndani ya chumba ambamo kawaida shangaziye alilala.

narration.utterances: Alishangaa alimpomwona mtu amejigubika blanketi

text.sentence: Alishangaa alimpomwona mtu amejigubika blanketi.

narration.utterances: Shangazi mbona masikio yako ni makubwa sana leo

text.sentence: "Shangazi, mbona masikio yako ni makubwa sana leo?"

narration.utterances: Kalabushe aliuliza

text.sentence: Kalabushe aliuliza.

narration.utterances: Sinsou alijibu kutoka ndani ya lile blanketi kubwa Ili niweze kukusikia vyema

text.sentence: Sinsou alijibu kutoka ndani ya lile blanketi kubwa, "Ili niweze kukusikia vyema."

narration.utterances: Kalabushe aliuliza tena Shangazi mbona macho yako ni makubwa sana leo

text.sentence: Kalabushe aliuliza tena, "Shangazi, mbona macho yako ni makubwa sana leo?"

narration.utterances: Sinsou alijibu Ili niweze kukuona vyema

text.sentence: Sinsou alijibu, "Ili niweze kukuona vyema."

narration.utterances: Mwishowe Kalabushe aliuliza Shangazi mbona mdomo wako ni mkubwa sana leo

text.sentence: Mwishowe Kalabushe aliuliza, "Shangazi, mbona mdomo wako ni mkubwa sana leo?"

narration.utterances: Sinsou alijibu Ili niweze kukumeza

text.sentence: Sinsou alijibu, "Ili niweze kukumeza."

narration.utterances: Kisha Sinsou aliruka na kummeza Kalabushe

text.sentence: Kisha Sinsou aliruka na kummeza Kalabushe.

narration.utterances: Kwa vile Kalabushe alipenda kuongea sana alizidi kuzungumza na kuuliza maswali mengi hata alipokuwa ndani ya tumbo lake Sinsou

text.sentence: Kwa vile Kalabushe alipenda kuongea sana, alizidi kuzungumza na kuuliza maswali mengi hata alipokuwa ndani ya tumbo lake Sinsou.

narration.utterances: Mwishoni Sinsou alichoshwa na maswali mengi ya Kalabushe akaamua kumtema nje

text.sentence: Mwishoni, Sinsou alichoshwa na maswali mengi ya Kalabushe akaamua kumtema nje.

text.sentence: Kalabushe na shangaziye waliokolewa na wanakijiji.

narration.utterances: Tokea siku ile Kalabushe alikoma kuzungumza sana na watu waliokuwa wageni kwake
